description: The OSRS OSINT Source Authors galaxy is used for the tracking of authors in association to the OSINT artificats collected.
name: OSRS-OSINT-Source-Authors

values.description: An experienced IT writer and editor, I've spent the past 14+ years honing my skills, building my contacts and broadening my horizons. At PM Media I now provide a comprehensive range of copywriting and media consultancy services to a wide variety of clients, albeit with a technology bias. I've been able to consistently deliver compelling copy on time and to brief, including blogs; white papers; case studies; EDMs; awards entries; and bylined opinion articles. Clients past and present include Microsoft, Cisco, Lenovo, Barclaycard, Worldpay, Trend Micro, Ferrero, and PayPal.
